header.title: Apache MyFaces - MyFaces inside of Tomcat 5.5.x

section.title: MyFaces inside of Tomcat 5.5.x
section.p: Some users had problems by using MyFaces and Tomcat5.5. Here is a short guide that hopefully helps :-)

ul.li: binary version: MyFaces is designed to work with Tomcat5.0.x. So if you want to use Tomcat 5.5.x you have to remove two JAR files of the WEB-INF/lib folder. That files are jsp-2.0.jar and commons-el.jar.
source version: If you want to build MyFaces from a scratch, so you have to set inside the file $MYFACES_HOME/build/build.default.properties the property tomcat.pre.5.5.version to the value false.
That all does not help? Please contact the user list of MyFaces!
